events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #19438 (Introduce deploymentstatus by ajtowns)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

This appears to be minor typos, rephrasing and a renaming of `RewindBlockIndex` to `NeedsRedownload` and `BlockMetadataManager` to `BlockManager`. It would be nice for reviewers to have a PR description explaining the context for these renamings rather than needing to explore a chain of PRs to figure it out.

`RewindBlockIndex` was removed in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21009 but wasn't removed from all the comments in that PR.

I don't know why `BlockMetadataManager` was in the comments. It was introduced in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/16194 but only in the comments but not the code. It is referred to in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15606 but not introduced in the code.

> It seems to be introduced in #15606 but that isn't merged yet.

I don't think this pull introduces it either. It is just another outdated comment (or typo) in the pull description.
